translations: 临时房屋；帐篷；神龛；礼拜堂，会堂；圣所，会幕；桅座，夹桅板；圣体盒

sentences.sentence: Make a courtyard for the tabernacle.
Make all teh frames of the tabernacle in this way.
sentences.translation: 帐幕一切的板都要这样做。

sentences.sentence: They made upright frames of acacia wood for the tabernacle.
sentences.translation: 他用皂荚木做帐幕的竖板。
